Address.Address1: NAPHO - KHIRIMAS ROAD, MUANG KAO, MUANG 9/9

Description.Text: The charming Le Charme Sukhothai, is a newly Thai-styled resort in Sukhothai, Northern Thailand. The resort uniquely provides an emotional break concept from Sukhothai's ancient remains ambience with 40 brand-new vivid villas nestled by lotus ponds and tropical garden. Le Charme Sukhothai, further, is located only five minutes away from Sukhothai Historical Park, UNESCO World Heritage. The perfect harmony between emotional break concept and Sukhothai ancient culture leads Le Charme Sukhothai to the most appealing destination in Sukhothai. The hotel also offers lobby, reception and smoke-free hotel.

Le Charme Sukhothai Resort is nestled at an ideal location amidst the old town of Sukhothai and just a kilometre away from to the Sukhothai Historical Park, the ruins of Thailand first capital which was declared as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO. The concept of this charming resort is capturing the splendor of a bygone age and represent it with an inspiration to offer a unique retreat of lively contemporary Thai village style paradise.

Superior Room - Superior Room + Breakfast offers one double bed or three twin bed or one queen bed with air conditioning , balcony / terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, refrigerator, room service and telephone. 28 sq.m. Beautiful designed in modern Sukhothai style villas surrounded by the flowering lotus ponds and tropical garden. Each room equips with full-scale amenities and finest wooden furniture that offer a utmost convenience. Room Amenities : Individually controlled Armchair, Dressing Table, Day-bed, Toilet, Hot-Cold Shower and Wardrobe.
Deluxe Room - Deluxe Room + Breakfast one double bed or three twin bed or one queen bed with air conditioning , balcony / terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, refrigerator, room service and telephone. 32 sq.m. Decorate in a variety of vivid colors and comfortable bed styles surrounded by flowering lotus ponds and tropical garden. The rooms are spacious and fully equipped with quality amenities Room Amenities : Individually controlled Armchair, Dressing Table, Day-bed, Toilet, Hot-Cold Shower and Wardrobe.
